scenario: Charlie received the following amounts during the year: Wages: $40,557.64, Return of Capital: $19,818.54, Gambling Winnings: $19,546.86, Interest on Bank Account: $11,110.54.
question: Calculate Charlie's gross income under I.R.C. § 61.
answer_explanation: Gross income includes all income from whatever source derived, unless excluded. Total: $71,215.04.
reasoning: Summed included items, ignored excluded items (Gifts, Loans, etc.).
